00017 #ifndef BT_COMPOUND_COLLISION_ALGORITHM_H
00018 #define BT_COMPOUND_COLLISION_ALGORITHM_H

00025 class btDispatcher;
00026 #include "BulletCollision/BroadphaseCollision/btBroadphaseProxy.h"
00027 #include "btCollisionCreateFunc.h"
00028 #include "LinearMath/btAlignedObjectArray.h"
00029 #include "BulletCollision/BroadphaseCollision/btDbvt.h"
00030 class btDispatcher;
00031 class btCollisionObject;
00032 
00033 class btCollisionShape;
00034 typedef bool (*btShapePairCallback)(const btCollisionShape* pShape0, const btCollisionShape* pShape1);
00035 extern btShapePairCallback gCompoundChildShapePairCallback;
00036 
00038 class btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm  : public btActivatingCollisionAlgorithm
00039 {
00040         btNodeStack stack2;
00041         btManifoldArray manifoldArray;
00042 
00043 protected:
00044         btAlignedObjectArray<btCollisionAlgorithm*> m_childCollisionAlgorithms;
00045         bool m_isSwapped;
00046 
00047         class btPersistentManifold*     m_sharedManifold;
00048         bool                                    m_ownsManifold;
00049 
00050 
00051         int     m_compoundShapeRevision;//to keep track of changes, so that childAlgorithm array can be updated
00052         
00053         void    removeChildAlgorithms();
00054         
00055         void    preallocateChildAlgorithms(const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap);
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00059         btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm( const btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,bool isSwapped);
00060 
00061         virtual ~btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm();
00062 
00063         btCollisionAlgorithm* getChildAlgorithm (int n) const
00064         {
00065                 return m_childCollisionAlgorithms[n];
00066         }
00067 
00068 
00069         virtual void processCollision (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut);
00070 
00071         btScalar        calculateTimeOfImpact(btCollisionObject* body0,btCollisionObject* body1,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut);
00072 
00073         virtual void    getAllContactManifolds(btManifoldArray& manifoldArray)
00074         {
00075                 int i;
00076                 for (i=0;i<m_childCollisionAlgorithms.size();i++)
00077                 {
00078                         if (m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i])
00079                                 m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i]->getAllContactManifolds(manifoldArray);
00080                 }
00081         }
00082 
00083         
00084         struct CreateFunc :public       btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc
00085         {
00086                 virtual btCollisionAlgorithm* CreateCollisionAlgorithm(btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci, const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap)
00087                 {
00088                         void* mem = ci.m_dispatcher1->allocateCollisionAlgorithm(sizeof(btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm));
00089                         return new(mem) btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm(ci,body0Wrap,body1Wrap,false);
00090                 }
00091         };
00092 
00093         struct SwappedCreateFunc :public        btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc
00094         {
00095                 virtual btCollisionAlgorithm* CreateCollisionAlgorithm(btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci, const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap)
00096                 {
00097                         void* mem = ci.m_dispatcher1->allocateCollisionAlgorithm(sizeof(btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm));
00098                         return new(mem) btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm(ci,body0Wrap,body1Wrap,true);
00099                 }
00100         };
00101 
00102 };
